name: MenuPopupShowParams
summary: Dictionary of options for showing a menu popup with show.

properties.name: animated
properties.summary: Determines whether the menu popup should be opened or closed animated.

properties.name: arrowDirection
properties.summary: Indicates the arrow direction of the menu popup.
properties.description: Use this property to indicate the menu popups arrow to use.

properties.name: view
properties.summary: The view where the menu pop is shown at.
